languages.text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.
languages.original_text: Пластины адамантиума защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 12 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} на левом и правом борту и по 5 урона на носу и корме.

traits.locale_text: Galleon Adamantium Plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 15 points of Damage on the Port and Starboard and 5 points of Damage on the Fore and Aft.

traits.locale_text: Пластины адамантиума защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 15 урона на левом и правом борту и по 5 урона на носу и корме.

languages.text: Die Galeonen-Adamant-Panzerung schützt das Schiff vor Schaden, indem sie 12 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schadenspunkte{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{/g} sowie 5 Schadenspunkte an Bug und Heck abwehrt.
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Die Galeonen-Adamantium-Panzerung schützt das Schiff vor Schaden, indem sie 15 Schadenspunkte an {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace} und 5 Schadenspunkte an Bug und Heck abwehrt.

languages.text: Le revêtement en adamantine de galion protège le vaisseau en absorbant 12 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g}, et 5 points de dégâts à l'avant et à l'arrière.
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Le revêtement en adamantium de galion protège le vaisseau, annulant 15 points de dégâts à {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g}, et 5 points de dégâts à l'avant et à l'arrière.

languages.text: 星帆舰精金船板可保护舰船免受伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}可抵消12点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，其他各个方向可抵消5点伤害。
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: 星帆舰精金船板可保护舰船免受伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}可抵消12点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，其他各个方向可抵消5点伤害。

languages.text: Las placas de adamantino de galeón protegen la nave contra el daño, negando 12 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} y 5 a proa y a popa.
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Las placas de adamantio de galeón protegen la nave contra el daño, negando 15 puntos de daño a {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} y 5 a proa y a popa.

languages.text: 船体を損傷から守るガレオン・アダマンチウム装甲。{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を12ポイント無効化し、船首と船尾のダメージを5ポイント無効化する。
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: 船体を損傷から守るガレオン・アダマンチウム装甲。{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を12ポイント無効化し、船首と船尾のダメージを5ポイント無効化する。

languages.text: Kalyon adamantini kaplama, {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}iskele{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}sancak{/g} taraflarında 12'şer puanlık ve pruva ile kıç taraflarında da 5'er puanlık {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} yadsıyarak gemiyi zarar görmekten korur.
languages.original_text: Galleon adamantine plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 12 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 5 points of damage on the fore and aft.
